    • com.apusplay.sdk中PayCallBack的使用

      参数类型为PayCallBack的com.apusplay.sdk中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void ApusPlaySdk.pay(Context context, Bundle parameters, PayCallBack payCallBack)
      已过时。 
      This is deprecated method. Please use alternative approach as following // 3. Get Payable instance with PayConfig // 3.1 Prepare PayConfig PayConfig payConfig = ApusPlaySdk.getInstance().getPayConfig(); // 3.2 Get payable instance via payConfig // If the payConfig is null, the default payconfig would be used. Payable pay = PayManager.getPayable(payConfig); // 4. Invoke the pay method with required arguments if(pay!=null){ pay.pay(context, parameters, payCallBack); } else { // Error }
